verbs.description: preedit (third-person singular simple present preedits, present participle preediting, simple past and past participle preedited)

examples: Some systems require their users to preedit text—for example, into lines (as in WinMAX Pro and AQUAD) or into paragraphs not exceeding a certain length (NUD*IST and NVivo recognize paragraphs by carriage returns).
